image_1.description: Bratstvo battalion is a volunteer Ukrainian special forces team, including PERSON 1 and PERSON 2, standing on the dock and preparing for an activity, which involves conducting secret raids and special operations against Russian forces on the Dnipro River.

image_2.description: Gareth Bale, playing for Wales, scored a penalty kick resulting in a 1-1 final score in the World Cup.

image_3.description: Richard M. Fierro, also known as Mr. Fierro, is an older man with a serious expression, wearing a black hoodie, who engaged in heroic actions during the shooting incident, pulling a friend down with him and later tackling the gunman.

image_5.description: Jeremy Pope is the central figure in the event 'Telling Himself ‘Yes’, discussing his personal journey and the film 'The Inspection'.
